amendment.description: To strengthen the authority under section 852 to provide Federal support for the enhancement of the emergency response capabilities of State and local governments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 785 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 785 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S6902) To strengthen the authority under section 852 to provide Federal support for the enhancement of the emergency response capabilities of State and local governments.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 785 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 785 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dodd.
